mapper.update:
update wf_snapshot
SNAPSHOT_ID = #{record.snapshotId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SNAPSHOT_NAME = #{record.snapshotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHAPSHOT_SRC = #{record.shapshotSrc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OWNER_PROJECT_ID = #{record.ownerProjectId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OWNER_FLOW_ID = #{record.ownerFlowId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SNAPSHOT_VERSION = #{record.snapshotVersion,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SNAPSHOT_STATE = #{record.snapshotState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DESCRIPTION = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{record.lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATE_OPER = #{record.lastUpdateOper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_OPER = #{record.createOper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SNAPSHOT_CONTENT = #{record.snapshotContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
